alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa Coastal; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 2:24PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Okaloosa and southeastern Santa Rosa Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 124 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles north of Navarre to 7 miles northwest of Wright to 4 miles southwest of Eglin Air Force Base. Movement was west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wright, Niceville, Eglin AFB, Valparaiso and Shalimar. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Okaloosa Coastal; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland
